idea:
This plan will help all needy mothers to earn money by making food for the needy customers.

This type of startup will help those kind of mom who have hardly any support from their family and lacks finance to full fill their daily needs.With this startup, they cant be dependent on anyone anymore.They can also live their life at that stage of life happily. Our startup will play mediator between customer who need food and mother who needs financial help.
name: MAA KE HAATH KA KHANA

idea:
Our capabilities include expertise in cosmetics manufacturing, new product development, market and business research, brand creation, sales and marketing support, scaling up business, Trend follow ups. etc.

We support:

- Entities to launch new cosmetics products

- Entrepreneurs to launch their cosmetics brand & products

- Brands to reach out to manufacturers and factories according to their requirement

- Lifestyle brands to get in to cosmetics

- "Go To" market strategies for all the above
name: VAINCE COSMETICS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We have a unique formulation of an energy drink which has the capacity to take on brands like Red bull,Monster which are imported and cost the indian exchanger out flow of foreign currency.


Stage 1 

Time frame:2020-2021

Our primary goal is to apply for a preliminary formulation patent to protect our formula in india.

Currently we are developing and refining sample test batches of the same are being made.

Once feedback is gathered from a sample bath and feedback from different streams of audiences we will improvise the formula.


Stage 2 

Time frame:2021-2024

Once the formula is fixed we intend on distribution in the indian market.


Stage 3  (Export) 2020-2024


We also want to export our beverage in the overseas market to markets like UAE which is our first primary to target.


We would need a lot of support in the form of legal advisory, mentors.


Stage 4 (100% indigenous ingredients)


All ingredients which are to be used would have in the beverage have to be 100% locally available in india without the need to import any of the ingredients.

Its possible that the product viability maybe hampered by due to unforeseen circumstances like trade wars, shortages, natural calamities, currency fluctuations, political changes. 


Our aim would also be to produce all the raw materials  and also boost those industries which would employ more of local people create employment and opportunities for the youth of this country.
